glsa.title: NVIDIA drivers: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in the NVIDIA graphic drivers, allowing for a Denial of Service.

background.p: The NVIDIA drivers provide support for NVIDIA graphic boards.

description.p: Gregory Shikhman discovered that the default Gentoo setup of NVIDIA drivers creates the /dev/nvidia* with insecure file permissions.

impact.p: A local attacker could send arbitrary values into the devices, possibly resulting in hardware damage on the graphic board or a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All NVIDIA drivers users should upgrade to the latest version:
